channel.title: PrestaShop modules on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in PrestaShop modules on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Introduction Technical principles behind a module A PrestaShop module consists of a main PHP file with as many other PHP files as needed, as well as the necessary template (.tpl) files and assets (images, JavaScript, CSS, etc.) to display the module’s interface, whether to the customer (on the front office) or to the merchant (on the back office). Any PrestaShop module, once installed on an online shop, can interact with one or more “hooks”.
